description: An adult duck wearing glasses stands in a doorway, appearing exasperated, while two smaller ducks look up from the floor. The scene depicts a surreal domestic moment where a parental figure issues bizarre and physically impossible instructions for going to sleep. The situation highlights the absurdity of applying human behavioral expectations to animals, creating a humorous contrast between mundane parenting frustrations and a completely nonsensical command.
caption: "I'm not telling you kids again! ... Stand on one leg, turn your head straight back, and go to sleep!"
